about_the_game:
ATTENTION! The demo version of the game is available only during the "Steam Next Fest"

GAMEPLAY
Good old “point & click game” + little action.

PLOT

Manny came to the M City for his beloved, Mary. It may seem like a simple love story, but things aren't as simple as they appear. The catch is that Mary, Manny's beloved, is considered missing, and her trail led our hero to the peculiar M City. The city is located in the middle of a forest, and its inhabitants are quite unusual and strange. By the way, with our hero Manny, too, not everything is so simple. He suffers from dissociative identity disorder, constantly engaging in conversations with his imaginary friends in his head. You have the chance to take part in Manny's adventures, help him find Mary, and uncover the mysteries and secrets of M City.




PECULIARITIES

• Made by one single developer
• Completely hand-drawn game
• An intriguing plot will linger in your memory for a long time
• Insanely interesting characters, well-thought-out story

EPISODES

M City will have five episodes. The first episode introduces the characters and the city, and in the following episodes the story of the game develops even more interestingly!
